H0.text: The German company Recaro famously produces what high-performance product. Helmet

H1.text: The German company Recaro famously produces what high-performance product. Gloves

H2.text: The German company Recaro famously produces what high-performance product. Boots

H3.text: The German company Recaro famously produces what high-performance product. Seat

A4.text: Recaro is the producer of the Recaro CL3710, one of the most renowned and popular long haul economy-class seat used on more than 50 airlines worldwide.
